tweet: Finding a niche can be a problem; You often suffer information overload and end up taking no action.
Making money online is (in theory) simple.  All you do is capture, divert and convert - but getting it right is tricky.
There are many methods of making money on line - but to succeed you must have one thing and one thing only: perseverance
All things being equal there is one overriding reqiurement in a niche; Are people spending money - Just following your passion may not do it
Here is a link to one of the niche research tools that I use http://bit.ly/aqzArC. Check out the free Videos on niche marketing
